title: Data Packages
text:
1. Random Data
I created a data package for my students in POL 051, called RandomData
Included in the data package is:

F1 Data

View the Data Package on GitHub
To install the package in R:

 install.packages("remotes")
 remotes::install_github("hbdaarstad/RandomData")

title: Haley Daarstad
text:
Bio
Hello and welcome! My name is Haley and I am a PhD Candidate in the political science department at The University of California, Davis. I research electoral and criminal violence with a focus on gender and research methods. Specifically, I am interested in electoral and criminal violence and its gendered dimension, such as understanding how various forms of violence affect how women participate in the electoral process. Methodologically, I am interested in the use of causal inference and machine learning.
Other than academics, I was born and raised in California, and attended Oregon State University where I obtained a bachelors degree in Political Science and New Media Communications in 2021. In my free time, I enjoy trail riding, running and downhill and cross-country skiing. I also love playing any type of games with my friends. I am also a huge fan of Formula1, papaya are my colors.
